message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $11,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but I'm only able to pay $10,500 at this time.  It's a fair price considering your own value for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $10,500.  Would you consider meeting in the middle at $11,000?
